meanings.definition: A person of distinction or importance.
meanings.sent1: The mayor was a respected personage in the town.
meanings.sent2: The king was a powerful personage in the kingdom.
meanings.sent3: The little girl pretended to be a royal personage in her make-believe game.
meanings.sent4: The celebrity was a towering personage in the world of entertainment.
meanings.sent5: The historical figure was a legendary personage in the annals of time.

meanings.definition: A character in a play or story.
meanings.sent1: The villain was a menacing personage in the movie.
meanings.sent2: The hero was a brave personage in the novel.
meanings.sent3: The clown was a funny personage in the circus performance.
meanings.sent4: The ghost was a haunting personage in the haunted house.
meanings.sent5: The wizard was a magical personage in the fantasy tale.

meanings.definition: A figure or representation of a person.
meanings.sent1: The statue was a lifelike personage of the historical leader.
meanings.sent2: The painting depicted a regal personage from the past.
meanings.sent3: The cartoon character was a colorful personage in the animated series.
meanings.sent4: The mannequin was a stylish personage in the fashion show.
meanings.sent5: The sculpture was a striking personage in the art gallery.
